name: Descent into Darkness
description:
You've had a comfortable life on the surface, but the situation has grown desperate, and the time for comfort and light are over.  It is time to make a...

This is a community-driven real-time dungeon crawler for Mini Micro.

Objective

Explore the dungeon. Shoot magical bolts at monsters to gain XP. Collect treasure from chests. Drop through pits to ever-deeper levels of the dungeon. How far can you go?

Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys: move/strafe.
  • Mouse: rotate and look up/down.
  • Shift or Tab: toggle door.
  • Spacebar or Return: fire a spell.
  • M: show in-game map.
Known Issues
  • Walls and doors may sometimes fail to render when you get too close.
  • Frame-rate drops when you look down a very long line of rooms.
  • Monsters may sometimes draw on top of chests when they should draw behind.
Installation Instructions
  1. Download the descent.minidisk file below.
  2. Also download Mini Micro, if you don't have it already.
  3. Run Mini Micro, then click on the top disk slot. Select "Mount..." and choose the descent.minidisk file you downloaded in step 1.
  4. Type reboot at the prompt and press Enter or Return.
